variations.description: After a short charge, emits a beam of light that attacks all enemies 3 times within 1 second, each time dealing damage equal to 60% of Viola's ATK.
After a short charge, emits a beam of light that attacks all enemies 3 times within 1 second, each time dealing damage equal to 70% of Viola's ATK.
After a short charge, emits a beam of light that attacks all enemies 3 times within 1 second, each time dealing damage equal to 80% of Viola's ATK.
After a short charge, emits a beam of light that attacks all enemies 3 times within 1 second, each time dealing damage equal to 90% of Viola's ATK.
After a short charge, emits a beam of light that attacks all enemies 3 times within 1 second, each time dealing damage equal to 100% of Viola's ATK.
For 6 seconds, all damages taken by the team are split equally among the Dolls. Also reduces all damage taken by 18%.
For 6 seconds, all damages taken by the team are split equally among the Dolls. Also reduces all damage taken by 21%.
For 6 seconds, all damages taken by the team are split equally among the Dolls. Also reduces all damage taken by 24%.
For 6 seconds, all damages taken by the team are split equally among the Dolls. Also reduces all damage taken by 27%.
For 6 seconds, all damages taken by the team are split equally among the Dolls. Also reduces all damage taken by 30%.
After taking lethal damage, Viola reveals her mechanical core, which takes 100% more damage. If the core is not destroyed within 5s, the Doll will be auto repaired. Can only trigger once per combat.
After taking lethal damage, Viola reveals her mechanical core, which takes 50% more damage. If the core is not destroyed within 5s, the Doll will be auto repaired. Can only trigger once per combat.
